title: Nez Perce National Historical Park: Collections
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     History & Culture     Collections               Collections         Some of the items in the park's collection deal with Nez Perce horse culture. Here, on display are horse accouterments from the nineteenth century. NPS  Nez Perce National Historical Park has a rich collection of items related to Nez Perce culture and history. From archeological specimens to archival materials, the park's collection encompasses ten thousand years of history.  The exhibit at the Spalding visitor center features a small sampling of items from the collection. If there are items related to Nez Perce history that you would like to donate, please call the park at (208) 843-7001 or contact us through e-mail, and schedule an appointment with the park's curator.
